class.name: Desync
class.brief_description: Interface to the Desync library for extracting files.
class.description: The Desync class provides an untar method, enabling file extraction via the Desync library.

method.name: untar
method.description: Untars a file using the Desync library. Returns an integer representing the operation's outcome. A return value of 0 indicates success, any other value signifies an error.
